channel.title: My steel dragons wont hit me?
channel.description: When i fight my steel dragons they wont hit me always 0 i just added them can someone help me?

@pobdol wrote:

Message me your Server Ip, I’ll check it out.

item.source: My steel dragons wont hit me?

item.title: My steel dragons wont hit me?
item.dc:creator: @yniace yniace
item.description:
@yniace wrote:

[quote=“pobdol, post:2, topic:343132”][quote author=yniace link=topic=439531.msg3229714#msg3229714 date=1275935067]
When i fight my steel dragons they wont hit me always 0 i just added them
can someone help me?
[/quote]
In your server files go to npc.cfg and search steel_dragon
Replace What you got with this:

npc = 1592	Steel_dragon			246	400

Incase your wondering the number 246 is your dragons java level, and the number 400 is the amount of Hitpoints the dragon has. Hope I helped :)[/quote]
Thats not the problem every npc wont hit me -.- always 0 0 0 0 on me

Read full topic
item.source: My steel dragons wont hit me?

item.title: My steel dragons wont hit me?

item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

[quote=“yniace, post:1, topic:343132”]When i fight my steel dragons they wont hit me always 0 i just added them
can someone help me?[/quote]
In your server files go to npc.cfg and search steel_dragon
Replace What you got with this:

npc = 1592	Steel_dragon			246	400

Incase your wondering the number 246 is your dragons java level, and the number 400 is the amount of Hitpoints the dragon has. Hope I helped
